excerpt: Spicy, aromatic and decadent Thai curry with delicious green veggies.

ingredients.name: Vegetables - broccoli, green beans, bell peppers, baby corn, zucchini

instructions: Add all the paste ingredients to a blender and blend into a smooth paste. Add a little water to help blend if necessary.
In a deep pan or a wok, heat the coconut oil. Add the curry paste and sauté for a minute till fragrant.
Add the chopped vegetables and sauté for 2-3 minutes till they begin to soften.
Add the coconut milk and stir well. Add salt to taste.
Simmer the curry for 5-7 minutes on low heat till the vegetables are cooked and the curry has thickened a bit.
Add the torn lime and basil leaves and stir well. Serve the curry hot with steamed rice. Garnish with chopped coriander and a wedge of lime.
